channel.title: Bulk interface driver won't install win 7
channel.description:
Board arrived yesterday , plugged it in today, bulk interface driver won't won't install.
Running windows 7.
Looked in runtime files and can't see anything that looks like a windows driver installation file to do it manually.
only reference to anything like this problem I can find on this forum has a link to the runtime download which is of no use.
Where are the driver files to do a manual installation?

item.title: Bulk interface driver won't install win 7
item.dc:creator: @strum
item.description:
@strum wrote:

That's good to know,

Perhaps you could answer a few questions for me if you have time then?

Read full topic

item.title: Bulk interface driver won't install win 7
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Win 7 no usb found with matching PID/VID

The windows bundle installer is still missing firmware though, working on it...

Have you tried suggestions covered in the above thread.

The drivers mentioned are here

https://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases/tag/1.0.6
